comment: Great reverse engineering, mind-boggling findings, well and entertainingly presented. Occasionally fast-paced yet always wrapped up understandably.
Great hack value, well presented, and entertaining.
Impressive security research. The presentation is rather dense and therefore hard to follow.
Entertaining. Occasionally a bit hard to follow the slides.
Neben der üblichen Einführung wird die Hacker-Ethik mit persönlichen Geschichten und aktuellen Ereignissen verbunden.

Well presented and entertaining. As (cable) modems from internet providers often come bundled with router functionality nowadays, you might prefer using (at least) your own router after watching this talk.
